author: Cory Stieg
title: Why video games like The Sims and Animal Crossing are so soothing right now
description: There's a reason why everyone on your social media feed is playing The Sims and Animal Crossing right now. Experts say that these "life simulation" games give us a sense of autonomy, socialization and confidence. (They also help you pass time spent at home.) …
content:
While people around the world stay home to prevent the spread of COVID-19, gamers are turning to "life simulation" video games to kill time and escape the chaos of the real world.
